#summary Add new quantities to NairnMPM archiving options

= Introduction =

NairnMPM has a customizable archive method. This page explains how to add an option to archive a new quantity from the calculation results. This page also explains how to [WikiSyntax#Add_Global_Archive_Quantity].


= Basic Steps =

1. Create new constant and add to archive constants in ArchiveData.hpp
    a. Put particle property before ARCH_MAXMPMITEMS
    b. Put crack property before ARCH_MAXCRACKITEMS

2. In ArchiveData class
    a. Add default archiving setting in constructor for new option to default archiving order
		This is the order and content used if the XML input file does not specify an order.
    b. Add size calculation in ArchiveData::CalcArchiveSize() for new item
    
4. Archive the data in Archive Class
    If new option is material point property then
       a. Add writing option in ArchiveData::ArchiveResults() for new item
       b. Add reversing option in ArchiveData::ArchiveResults() for new item

    If new option is a crack property then
       a. Add writing option in ArchiveData::FillArchive()
       b. Add reversing option in ArchiveData::FillArchive()
